about_the_game:
In the immersive world of Kingdom, you are being transported to a fantastical realm filled with enchanting landscapes, mythical creatures, and epic adventures. This is not just your average RPG; it's a dynamic survival game that blends single and multiplayer experiences into an enthralling journey. Kingdom offers a unique twist, allowing players to don the crown, rule a realm, and make crucial decisions as a king, or venture into the treacherous wilderness to combat formidable foes like the dreaded Frost Giant, and Red Dragon.


As you progress, you have the opportunity to ascend to the throne as a king or queen. Becoming a monarch grants the power to rule a kingdom, complete with subjects, castles, and lands to govern. Kings and queens can impose taxes, build strongholds, and form alliances with other players. This dynamic multiplayer element introduces an exciting new dimension to the game.


In Kingdom, kings and queens hold the fate of their kingdom in their hands. They can set tax rates to fund grand projects. A wise ruler might lower taxes to appease the people, while a belligerent one could choose to raise them and amass a vast treasury for a potential military campaigns.


There are two giants in the game, one of them is The Frost Giant. A colossal, mythical creature that roams Frost Peak in Kingdom. It is a formidable adversary, capable of bringing devastation to entire regions. Defeating the Frost Giant is a monumental challenge that requires both strategy and strength. Players must coordinate their efforts, gather the mightiest armies, and utilize powerful artifacts to take down this legendary beast.
But the Frost Giant is not the only one. There is a dragon hidden deep in a volcano; this beast will stop at nothing to protect its treasure. So, you can't do funny with it.


Survive in this vast mythical world by gathering food, chopping trees, hunting deer, wolves, or bears, and mining iron ore in the depths of the earth. Thats how you become the mightiest player in the game!


A survival game is incomplete without building your own houses. But that's not all; you can construct impressive castles if you have enough time and resources!
